div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 72 Palaiomanina Xiromero, Aetolia, 1961 Burial: 350-325 B.C. Contents: 12 AR Pegasi: 12 st. (Corinth 3, Ambracia 1, Anactorium 2, Leucas 6) Disposition: Athens Varoucha, .BCH 1962, p. 421, illus. The Stymphalus coin mentioned by Va- roucha apparently does not belong to the hd.
